function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Misinformation and media hype surrounding the coronavirus outbreak","Impact":"Increased public panic and fear, leading to irrational behavior and social unrest","Mitigation":"Promote accurate information and scientific data through reliable sources, regulate misinformation on social media platforms","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms, public health communication platforms","People":"General public, social media users, individuals seeking information","Owner":"Health organizations, government agencies, social media platforms"},{"Description":"Spread of contagious diseases due to travel and social disruption","Impact":"Increased transmission of infectious diseases, potential for global pandemic, strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Enforce travel restrictions, implement rigorous screening and testing measures, promote vaccination and hygiene practices","Technologies":"Biometric screening technology, travel history tracking systems, electronic health records, telemedicine","People":"Travelers, healthcare workers, international communities","Owner":"Government agencies, healthcare organizations, international health authorities"},{"Description":"Economic impact and disruption of global markets","Impact":"Financial instability, loss of employment, reduced economic activity, potential for recession","Mitigation":"Implement economic stimulus measures, support affected industries and businesses, ensure access to financial resources for individuals and families","Technologies":"Financial risk assessment models, remote work technology, digital financial platforms, economic forecasting tools","People":"Business owners, workers, consumers, investors","Owner":"Financial institutions, government economic agencies, business associations"}]}
